      • createAndAddSDK

        public static Sdk createAndAddSDK(java.lang.String path,
                                  SdkType sdkType)
        Tries to create an SDK identified by path; if successful, add the SDK to the global SDK table.

        Must be called from the EDT (because it uses WriteAction.compute(com.intellij.openapi.util.ThrowableComputable<T, E>) under the hood).

        Parameters:
        path - identifies the SDK
        Returns:
        newly created SDK, or null.
